data.name: XDeleteListener
desc: This is the listener interface for receiving \"approveDelete\" and \"deleted\" events posted by a database form.
\"approveDelete\" may be used to abort a deletion of the current data record.
Please do not use anymore, this interface is superseded by com.sun.star.form.XConfirmDeleteListener.

methods.name: approveDelete
desc: is invoked when the current record of the database form will be deleted.

methods.name: deleted
desc: is invoked when a database form has finished the delete processing and the data has been successfully deleted from the datasource.
